Package com.jummania

Interface DataManager.Converter

All Known Implementing Classes:
GsonConverter
Enclosing interface:
DataManager
public static interface DataManager.Converter
Interface for converting between Java objects and JSON representations.

Implementations are responsible for serializing Java objects to JSON strings or streams, and deserializing JSON strings or streams back to Java objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T> T
    fromJson (String json, Class<T> tClass)
    Converts a JSON string into a Java object of the specified type.

  • Method Details

    • toJson

      <T> String toJson (T data)
      Converts a Java object to its JSON string representation.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object
      Parameters:
      data - the Java object to be converted to JSON
      Returns:
      a JSON string representing the object

    • toJson

      void toJson (Object src, Type typeOfSrc, Appendable writer)
      Serializes the given object into JSON using the specified type and writes it to the provided Appendable.

      This is useful when the object type includes generics or is not fully captured by its runtime class. The method allows streaming the JSON output directly to a Writer, StringBuilder, or any other Appendable.

      Parameters:
      src - the source object to serialize; must not be null
      typeOfSrc - the specific Type of the object to serialize
      writer - the destination Appendable to write the JSON output to

    • fromJson

      <T> T fromJson (String json, Class<T> tClass)
      Converts a JSON string into a Java object of the specified type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON string to be converted
      tClass - the class type of the object to return
      Returns:
      the Java object represented by the JSON string

    • fromReader

      <T> T fromReader (Reader json, Type typeOfT)
      Converts a JSON stream from a Reader into a Java object of the specified type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object
      Parameters:
      json - the Reader containing the JSON data
      typeOfT - the type of the object to be returned
      Returns:
      the Java object represented by the JSON data from the Reader
